input.sentences: my friend and i visited a city in location | and enjoyed dinner there .
then we went for a walk to see the sites | including this traditional temple .
we walked through the gates and headed through town .
at the shore | my friend had her picture taken by the water .
she found a shell that she loved and wanted to remember .
output.sentences: The family was on a trip to Japan.
They had never been to Japan and were excited to see the old buildings.
They also went to the beaches.
They found many cool shells on the beach.
